# footprints

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

footprints provides access to practical implementation of flux footprint modeling. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of footprints from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
# devtools::install_github("grahamstewart12/footprints")
```
